Toyota x Japan

Collaboration Proposal

Oh hey Toyota.
Let's cruise around Japan together and make some magic.

We've got a vision.


We're a group of content creators heading on a press trip to Japan to explore an off-the-beaten path itinerary -- together we can turn it into an epic road trip.


For two weeks in March 2019, we would cruise around Japan in an Toyota rental car capturing photo & video content for your social media as well as promoting Toyota to our audiences.

I'm Emilio, aka Eyes of a Nomad

I'm a content creator from Melbourne Australia currently living the dream in Bali, Indonesia. I love helping brands capture the essence of their personality and really telling a story through my work.

I split my time between travelling the world, doing photography & videography for brands, and teaching the next generation of content creators through my school the Institute of Code.

Our crew

I'll be travelling with adventure photographer Jess Bonde ( @wildbonde , professional model and influencer Rachel Bowler ( @rachel_bowler_ and my girlfriend and micro-influencer Tina May ( @hellotinamay .

We collectively have experience working with hundreds of brands from all over the world creating content that tells a story. We'll be travelling with a full professional setup -- Canon 5D Mk IV, Panasonic GH5, Mavic Pro 2 Drone, etc -- ready to create high resolution content for your brand.

The experience you need

We've worked car companies, local and international fashion & lifestyle brands, luxury villas and hotels, cafes and restaurants, tour companies and more. Our work has been featured by BBC, NYtimes, CNN, Discovery and is re-shared by major instagram accounts like @artofvisuals and @moodygrams on a regular basis.

From the streets of Tokyo to the slopes of Mt Fuji, we want to see it all in an Toyota rental car.

Our Pitch

We'll be exploring Japan for 2 weeks starting the 6th March and would love to do it in as a road trip. In exchange for providing a rental car for 2 weeks + fuel costs we could offer ...

  • 15x high resolution professionally edited photos
  • 1x 30 second video promotional video of the road trip
  • Mention in a minimum of 6 separate instagram stories on each persons instagram account (total 24 stories)
  • 2 dedicated instagram posts tagging @avis on each persons instagram account (total 8 posts)

Slide into my inbox

Keen to chat further? Send me an email and let's get the ball rolling.
